abstract: Bangkok, already afflicted by runoff from the north, braces for a high tide from the other direction on Saturday.
snippet: Bangkok, already afflicted by runoff from the north, braces for a high tide from the other direction on Saturday.
lead_paragraph: Runoff equivalent to 480,000 Olympic-size pools is pushing its way south through Bangkok. The high tide on Saturday will put extreme pressure on Bangkok's elaborate system of dikes and other flood defenses. [CNN]

headline.main: On Our Radar: Flooding in Bangkok
